body.p: Welcome to Stencila! This article gives you a quick overview of Stencila's features.
With Stencila you can author reproducible scientific publications. It features a word processor and spreadsheet editor, designed for research.

sec.title: Code Cells
sec.p: In Stencila you can insert code cells, which produce computed output.
Cells can be assigned to a variable for later reuse.
Stencila provides a that can be used out of the box.

sec.title: Data
sec.p: In Stencila datasets are part of the publication, not external assets. Use the tabs in the status bar to switch to the spreadsheet editor to see the data behind this publication. We can reference data from a spreadsheet and assign it to variable.
Now we are able to do some analysis.
